typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		salary as string,
		dept_id as string,
		load_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(empid>'1') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['abc_processed.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	header: (['empid,name,salary,dept_id,load_date']),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
